outputs.output_descr:
-Improve enforcement and compliance with regulations for marine park protection within ACMIC.
-Improve ACMIC's management of diving and terrestrial tourism to reduce physical damage to the marine and terrestrial ecosystems.
-Erradicate pigs and control other key invasive species to allow restoration of native species populations an decological processes.
-Develop financial instruments to generate revenuews to sustain on-going conservation operations and provide economic incentives t promote sustainable use of the Island's natural resources.
-Reform relevant policy and legislation to create a functioning and effective enabling environment for ACMIC.

project_descr: Improved Management and Conservation Practices on Cocos Island Marine Conservation Area - PIMS 1332
